    • Uses of Window in com.googlecode.lanterna.gui

      Methods in com.googlecode.lanterna.gui that return Window 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Window GUIScreen.getActiveWindow()
      Returns the top window in the window stack, the one which currently has user input focus.
      Window Component.getWindow()
      Returns the window which is directly or indirectly containing this component.
      Methods in com.googlecode.lanterna.gui with parameters of type Window 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void GUIScreen.closeWindow(Window window)
      Used internally to close a window; API users should call Window.close() instead
      void GUIScreen.showWindow(Window window)
      Same as calling showWindow(window, Position.OVERLAPPING)
      void GUIScreen.showWindow(Window window, GUIScreen.Position position)
      This method starts the GUI system with an initial window.

    • Uses of Window in com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.listener

      Methods in com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.listener with parameters of type Window 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void WindowAdapter.onFocusChanged(Window window, Interactable fromComponent, Interactable toComponent) 
      void WindowListener.onFocusChanged(Window window, Interactable fromComponent, Interactable toComponent)
      Called by the window whenever the input focus has changed from one component to another
      void WindowAdapter.onUnhandledKeyboardInteraction(Window window, Key key) 
      void WindowListener.onUnhandledKeyboardInteraction(Window window, Key key)
      Called by the window when there was a keyboard input event that no component could handle
      void WindowAdapter.onWindowClosed(Window window) 
      void WindowListener.onWindowClosed(Window window)
      Called by the window when it has been closed and removed from the GUIScreen.
      void WindowAdapter.onWindowInvalidated(Window window) 
      void WindowListener.onWindowInvalidated(Window window)
      Called when a window has been internally modified and needs to be repainted by the GUI system.
      void WindowAdapter.onWindowShown(Window window) 
      void WindowListener.onWindowShown(Window window)
      Called by the window when it has been added and showed up on a GUIScreen.
